title: Team Trump's Absurd Defenses for Don Jr.'s Emails: A Closer Look | Eric Schneiderman
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Trump administration's excuses for their behavior amid bombshell revelations about Donald Trump Jr.'s meeting with Russians. (0:19)
Then, Attorney General Eric Schneiderman talks to Seth about how he wound up on Donald Trump's enemies list, what it's like to sue the President and protecting the country from Washington D.C.'s bad idea toxic volcano. (14:28)
Schneiderman then goes backstage to answer a few more questions from Late Night producer Henry Melcher exclusively for this podcast. (20:36)
